amendment.description: Amendment sought to replace the text of S. 139 with the text of H.R. 4124, the USA RIGHTS Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-504 to replace the text of S. 139 with the text of the USA RIGHTS Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Amash amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 183 - 233 (Roll no. 14).

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Amash.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Amash.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Amash amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 183 - 233 (Roll no. 14).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Amash amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 183 - 233 (Roll no. 14).
